Curriculum

Here lies the path to mastery. Follow the modules in order, or jump to the topic you need.

Module 1: Introduction & Mindset

1. Introduction to Web Development ⏱ 15 min
2. Motivation and Mindset ⏱ 20 min
3. Join the Rebel Alliance ⏱ 15 min
4. How This Course Works ⏱ 10 min
5. Asking For Help ⏱ 10 min

Module 2: Computer & Environment Setup

6. Computer Basics ⏱ 20 min
7. Installation Overview ⏱ 15 min
8. Installations ⏱ 45 min
9. Text Editors ⏱ 30 min
10. Command Line Basics ⏱ 45 min

Module 3: Git & Version Control

11. Introduction to Git ⏱ 20 min
12. Setting up Git ⏱ 30 min
13. Git Basics ⏱ 45 min
14. Commit Messages ⏱ 15 min

Module 4: Web Fundamentals

15. How Does the Web Work? ⏱ 25 min
16. Introduction to HTML and CSS ⏱ 15 min

Module 5: HTML Essentials

17. Elements and Tags ⏱ 20 min
18. HTML Boilerplate ⏱ 25 min
19. Working with Text ⏱ 30 min
20. Lists ⏱ 20 min
21. Links and Images ⏱ 35 min

Module 6: CSS Fundamentals

22. Intro to CSS ⏱ 40 min
23. The Cascade ⏱ 30 min
24. Inspecting HTML and CSS ⏱ 25 min
25. The Box Model ⏱ 30 min
26. Block and Inline ⏱ 25 min

Module 7: Your First Project

27. Project: Recipes ⏱ 120 min
